title: GTD 标签 | 菠菜眾長
description: Hugo FixIt 作者，喜欢瞎折腾、造轮子、写东西，分享一些前端开发中的所见、所闻、所思。

items.title: Getting Things Done for ios App Reminders and Github issues
items.summary:
quote Getting Things Done (GTD) is a personal productivity system developed by David Allen and published in a book of the same name. GTD is described as a time management system. Allen states “there is an inverse relationship between things on your mind and those things getting done”.
Reference #20
